General Conference Bulletin, April 12, 1901  
     687. We want the pervading truth of God's word to get hold of every one of our people before this conference is over. We want them to understand that the flesh of animals is not the proper food for them to eat. Such a diet cultivates the animal passions in them and their children. God wants us 
                                                                           391
to educate our children in right habits of eating, dressing, and working. He wants us to do what we can to repair the broken-down machinery. 
     [EFFECT ON CHILDREN OF MEAT AND RICH FOODS--348, 350, 356,357, 361, 578, 621, 711]
